snippet: The Pro Football Hall of Fame would not allow Junior Seau’s daughter to give a speech at his induction ceremony. Recorded in her hotel room in Canton, Ohio, here’s what Sydney would have said.
abstract: Career NFL linebacker Junior Seau, who committed suicide at age 43, had asked his daughter Sydney to speak on his behalf if he should make it into Pro Football Hall of Fame; transcript of full speech, which Hall did not allow Sydney to deliver at his induction due to long-standing policies, given; induction ceremony did not include any mention of circumstances of Seau's death.
lead_paragraph: The Pro Football Hall of Fame would not allow Junior Seau’s daughter to give a speech at his induction ceremony. Recorded in her hotel room in Canton, Ohio, here’s what Sydney would have said.

headline.main: The Hall of Fame Speech Junior Seau’s Daughter Couldn’t Give
headline.print_headline: A Few Words About My Dad
